select_task.en: Please select one of the following tasks

thank_you.en: Thank you for partipating in our experiment!
thank_you.zh: 感谢您参加我们的实验！

tasks_completed.en: You have completed all the tasks. As a final step, please complete the following questionnaire and come back to this screen: {survey_link}
tasks_completed.zh: 您已完成所有任务。作为最后一步，请完成以下问卷并返回此页面: {survey_link}

complete_survey.en: You have completed the experiment, please fill in the following survey:
complete_survey.zh: 你已经完成实验，请填写问卷：

debrief.en: <center style='font-weight: bold; color: #6558d3; font-size: 22px; text-align: center; align-self: center;'>Aim of This Experiment</center>
debrief.zh: <center style='font-weight: bold; color: #6558d3; font-size: 22px; text-align: center; align-self: center;'>实验内容说明</center>

initial_choice.en: Please make an initial choice to start the conversation
initial_choice.zh: 请做出初始选择以开始对话

preference_guide.en: The following options show some ways to deal with this problem. Please read them carefully and make your preference score for each option. Please slide the slider to indicate your preference for each option.
preference_guide.zh: 以下选项展示了如何应对这个问题的一些方法，请你仔细阅读，对每个选项做出你的倾向性评分。请滑动滑块以表明您对每个选项的偏好。

confidence_label.zh: 对以上分数的确定程度

familiarity_label.en: Familiarity with the topic of this query
familiarity_label.zh: 对此查询话题的熟悉程度

user_scores.en: From 1 to 10, I have the following preferences for each option: {preferences}. In addition, I rate my familiarity with this topic as {fam_score} from 10 and confidence in my scores {conf_score} from 10.
user_scores.zh: 在 1 到 10 的范围内，我对每个选项有以下偏好：{preferences}。我对这个话题的熟悉度评分为 {fam_score}，对自己偏好的确定程度分为 {conf_score}。

user_message_change.en: I have changed my scores as follows: {score_changes}.
user_message_change.zh: 我更改了我的分数如下：{score_changes}。

chat_placeholder.en: Please ask your AI assistant about the problem you are facing based on the background information provided
chat_placeholder.zh: 请根据所提供的背景信息，向您AI助手咨询您面临的问题

ready_to_submit.en: You have reached {min_turns}. You can submit your scores from now!
ready_to_submit.zh: 已达到{min_turns}轮。从现在可以提交分数了！
